name: Terminal Illness

name: Infectious Fever

name: Jubokko

name: Banshee
description: SUMMON an ally with 40hp that deals 5 damage and inflicts ROT 10.  Any unit within radius 3 has their ROT durations doubled.  If this would cause a ROT duration to exceed the target's current hp it is killed, spawning an additional mushroom.
